metadata.feature_description: Search pages with multiple filters including page type, tags, publish status, date range, and workflow

steps.action: Navigate to Page Search Results and expand Advanced Filters
steps.expected: Advanced Filters panel displays with Page Type dropdown
steps.actual: Advanced Filters panel displayed with Page Type, Publish Status, Date Range, Workflow, and Tags filters

steps.action: Click Page Type dropdown to view options
steps.actual: Dropdown displayed options: None, Standard, Existing, URL, File

steps.action: Select 'URL' page type and click Apply
steps.expected: Search results filter to show only URL type pages
steps.actual: Filter applied showing 'NO PAGE FOUND' - correctly indicates no URL type pages exist
Dropdown displayed options: None, Published, Draft

steps.expected: Search results filter to show only Draft pages
steps.actual: Filter applied showing '40 PAGES FOUND' with all results having 'Draft' status
Dropdown displayed workflows: None, Direct Publish, Save Draft, Content Approval, Test Approval Workflow

steps.action: Select 'Test Approval Workflow' and click Apply
steps.expected: Search results filter to show pages with selected workflow
steps.actual: Filter applied showing '30 PAGES FOUND' with matching workflow

steps.action: Enter 'testtag' in the Tags filter field and click Apply
steps.expected: Search results filter to show pages with the specified tag
steps.actual: Filter applied showing 'NO PAGE FOUND' - correctly indicates no pages have the 'testtag' tag

steps.expected: Date picker appears with two calendars for range selection
steps.actual: Date picker opened showing two calendars for January 2026

steps.action: Navigate to December 2025 and select Dec 27, 2025 as start date, then Apply
steps.expected: Date range filter applied to search results
steps.actual: Date range '12/27/2025 - 01/16/2026' applied, showing '75 PAGES FOUND' with matching publish dates

steps.action: Apply both date range filter (12/27/2025 - 01/16/2026) and Publish Status (Draft)
steps.expected: Results should show only pages matching both criteria
steps.actual: Combined filters correctly show 'NO PAGE FOUND' since pages published in that date range are 'Published' status, not 'Draft'

steps.action: Clear all filters to display all pages
steps.expected: All pages displayed with pagination/scrolling capability
steps.actual: 78 PAGES FOUND displayed. Results use virtual/infinite scroll rather than traditional page-based pagination controls

steps.action: Enter non-existent search term 'nonexistentpage12345xyz' in search box
steps.expected: Search should return no results with appropriate message
steps.actual: Search correctly returned 'NO PAGE FOUND.' message

observations: The Page Type filter in the UI shows: Standard, Existing, URL, File. The suggested test scenarios mentioned 'normal' and 'template' types, but 'template' is not visible in the dropdown - this may be a system-level page type not exposed in the filter UI.
Pagination uses virtual scroll/infinite scroll approach rather than traditional page-numbered pagination. All 78 pages are loaded and displayed, allowing users to scroll through results.
The API supports pageIndex and pageSize parameters for pagination, but the UI implementation appears to load all results at once.
Tags filter UI allows free-text entry of tags as chips, enabling filtering by multiple tags if needed.
